name: E.X.T.N.D
description:
E.X.T.N.D: Defeat the human enemy by building upon yourself!

Note: if the WebGL build does not load there is a downloadable version for Windows.

You are a battle robot fighting the human resistance in the not-so-distant future. Your opponent has you outmanned and outgunned, at least they do until you decide to give yourself some upgrades!

Scrap your fallen robot comrades and use their remains to upgrade yourself into the ultimate killing machine, and press forward to the human base to wipe out their resistance.

Created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1, don't forget to vote!

Credits

Art, Programming, Design and Concept: Jack Davenport

Sounds sourced from freesound.org
